name: 布雷迪·埃利森
name_full: 布雷迪·埃利森 Brady Ellison
introduction: Brady 'The Arizona Cowboy' Ellison is an American archer who competes in recurve archery. He is currently a Resident Athlete at the United States Olympic Training Center in Chula Vista, California. He holds the record for the longest continuous period as the world number-one-ranked men's recurve archer, from August 2011 to April 2013. He earned his nickname "The Prospector" during the 2015 world championships due to his proclivity for 'finding gold'.
